TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Cursors extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供由 Windows 窗体应用程序使用的 对象的集合。

span.span: Provides a collection of objects for use by a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些在比所描述的那些不同的外观上可以执行此类中的对象。Some of the objects in this class can take on a different appearance than those described. 用户可以通过调整其操作系统中的鼠标指针设置更改光标外观。The user can change the cursor appearance by adjusting the mouse pointer settings in their operating system. 平移和静止游标是静态的不能更改操作系统。The panning and no move cursors are static and cannot be changed by the operating system. 平移和否移动鼠标滚轮操作过程中使用游标的。The panning and no move cursors are used during mouse wheel operations. 具体取决于可滚动窗口的方向，光标更改为相应任何移动光标时单击鼠标滚轮。Depending on the direction the window can be scrolled, the cursor changes to the appropriate no move cursor when the mouse wheel is clicked. 在移动鼠标时，光标然后更改为相应的平移光标。The cursor then changes to the appropriate panning cursor as the mouse is moved. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更改鼠标光标使用属性，类，与类。The following example demonstrates changing the mouse cursor using the property, the class, and the class. 该示例创建一个包含窗体控件，控件，和一个控件。The example creates a form that contains a control, a control, and a control. 包含由提供的所有游标类。The contains all cursors provided by the class. 当用户选择鼠标光标位于、属性设置为选定的光标，这将更新的光标。When the user selects a mouse cursor in the , the property is set to the selected cursor, which updates the cursor for the . 每次更新事件发生。The is updated every time the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/CPP/cursorexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/CS/cursorexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/VB/cursorexample.vb#1)] 下面的示例在其正常大小，并在延伸模式下，其大小的两倍，窗体上绘制指定的游标。The following example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此示例假定你有和地被调用时将传递给方法的对象。This example assumes that you have a and a object to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示类。The following example demonstrates the class. 若要运行此示例位置窗体中粘贴以下代码，并从窗体的构造函数或负载方法调用 InitializeRadioButtonsAndGroupBox 方法。To run this example place paste the following code in a form and call the InitializeRadioButtonsAndGroupBox method from the form's constructor or Load method. 确保所有事件都连接到其事件处理方法。Ensure all events are connected to their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写派生类中的方法和使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class and using the property. 若要运行该示例，在新的窗体中粘贴以下代码并粘贴构成窗体的后面的同一文件中，此类。To run the example, paste the following code in a new form and paste this class, forming the same file, after the form. 将类型 FunButton 的按钮添加到窗体。Add a button of type FunButton to the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取等待光标，通常是沙漏形状。

span.span: Gets the wait cursor, typically an hourglass shape.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示等待光标。

span.span: The that represents the wait cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要强制在给定控件上显示等待光标，调用该控件的方法。To force display of the wait cursor over a given control, call that control's method. 若要使整个应用程序，而不考虑控件或选窗体，显示等待光标调用上类。To make the wait cursor display for the entire application, regardless of the control or form selected, call on the class.
